name: fart party
description:
Not Just A Fart Party.

Something Else Happens.

Story:

Scratch Was Walking In A Town Called *BEEP* No, Not A Bad Word.

He Found Hat That Was Not Normal It Looked Like This.

This Is The Party Hat He Saw.

Then He Put It On His Head.

Then He Invited His Friends To His Birthday Party.

He Turned

But At One Moment...

He Farted On His Strawberry Cake

He got infected with the the party hat virus.

(FACT: The Hat Infects Anyone Who Touches The Infected Person.)

Then Everyone Ran Out The Party.

They Need To Find A Cure To This(They Still Are).

There Are 9000000 People In Scratch's World And 565477 Of Them Have The Virus.

(The Virus Lets Say Infected 45% Of Scratch's World.)

But One Day...

On June 14, 2047, They Have Made The Cure But Only 45% Have Lost The Virus.

But 55% Did Not.

The End.
